bibl.title: Egyptian and Greek Statuettes from Naucratis.
bibl.note: An Egyptian statuette (glazed ware, XXVIth Dyn.) and a Greek statuette (limestone, 28 cm high, VIth cent. B.C.?) for comparison.
bibl.seg: Gardner E.-A., Egyptian and Greek Statuettes from Naucratis.
An Egyptian statuette (glazed ware, XXVIth Dyn.) and a Greek statuette (limestone, 28 cm high, VIth cent. B.C.?) for comparison.
